headline: Coinbase Exec Warns Quantum Computing Threatens 33% of Bitcoin Supply – Here’s Why

headline: Third of Bitcoin vulnerable to quantum attack, warns Coinbase research chief
summary: Long-term threats to Bitcoin’s security are creeping up faster than markets expect, analyst warns. About one-third of all Bitcoin “appears vulnerable to long-range quantum attacks.” BlackRock also flagged quantum computing risks to the top crypto back in May.

headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks with Exciting Potential
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.
